main event: A UFO sighting was reported near Rockford, Michigan involving an object that changed colors and had a walnut size.
interesting points: The object had a round shape and displayed changing colors including red, green, and yellow., Three objects were observed, two in the west and one in the northeast., The object left a small red exhaust upon departure., The sighting lasted approximately 30 minutes in clear weather conditions., The report was part of Project Blue Book and included no physical evidence such as photographs.
witness description: Radio Dealer, sighting occurred at approximately 9:30 PM
